metadata.name: ai-foundry
metadata.description: Creates an AI Foundry account and project with Standard Agent Services.
Optional. Resource ID of an existing resource to use instead of creating a new one. If provided, other parameters are ignored.
Optional. Name to be used when creating the resource. This is ignored if an existingResourceId is provided.
Optional. The Resource ID of the Private DNS Zone that associates with the resource. This is required to establish a Private Endpoint and when 'privateEndpointSubnetResourceId' is provided.
Optional. Role assignments to apply to the resource when creating it. This is ignored if an existingResourceId is provided.
Custom configuration for a resource, including optional name, existing resource ID, and role assignments.
Optional. Resource Id of an existing Storage Account to use instead of creating a new one. If provided, other parameters are ignored.
Optional. Name to be used when creating the Storage Account. This is ignored if an existingResourceId is provided.
Optional. The Resource ID of the DNS zone "blob" for the Azure Storage Account. This is required to establish a Private Endpoint and when 'privateEndpointSubnetResourceId' is provided.
Optional. Role assignments to apply to the resource when creating it. This is ignored if an existingResourceId is provided.
Custom configuration for a Storage Account, including optional name, existing resource ID, containers, and role assignments.
Optional. The name of the AI Foundry account.
Optional. The location of the AI Foundry account. Will default to the resource group location if not specified.
Optional. SKU of the AI Foundry / Cognitive Services account. Use 'Get-AzCognitiveServicesAccountSku' to determine a valid combinations of 'kind' and 'SKU' for your Azure region. Defaults to 'S0'.

Optional. Whether to create Capability Hosts for the AI Agent Service. If true, the AI Foundry Account and default Project will be created with the capability host for the associated resources. Can only be true if 'includeAssociatedResources' is true. Defaults to false.
Optional. Allow only Azure AD authentication. Should be enabled for security reasons. Defaults to true.
Optional. Whether to allow project management in the AI Foundry account. If true, users can create and manage projects within the AI Foundry account. Defaults to true.
Optional. Values to establish private networking for the AI Foundry account and project.
Optional. AI Foundry default project.
Optional. Role assignments to apply to the AI Foundry resource when creating it.
Custom configuration for a AI Foundry, including optional account name and project configuration.
Optional. The Resource ID of the subnet for the Azure AI Services account. This is required if 'createAIAgentService' is true.
Required. The Resource ID of the Private DNS Zone for the Azure AI Services account.
Required. The Resource ID of the Private DNS Zone for the OpenAI account.
Required. The Resource ID of the Private DNS Zone for the Azure AI Services account.
Values to establish private networking for the AI Foundry service.
Optional. The name of the AI Foundry project.
Optional. The friendly/display name of the AI Foundry project.
Optional. The description of the AI Foundry project.
